lead_paragraph: An apartment at an Upper East Side co-op building designed by James E.R. Carpenter was the sale of the week.

headline.main: A Prewar Facing Central Park for $52 Million

snippet: An apartment at an Upper East Side co-op building designed by James E.R. Carpenter was the sale of the week.
abstract: Big Ticket column; four-bedroom full-floor co-op at 4 East 66th Street is highest residential sale of week in New York City, closing at $52,000,000.
